title: Scaffolding-Based Medical Education Design: Cases of Information Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Experience in Health Education
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Administrator/Leader, Domain Expertise: Intermediate, Delivery Method: BYOD Device-Based Collaborative Activities, Assessment Method: Summative Assessment-Centric (Final Presentation and Report Evaluation)

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply medical information retrieval strategies using IT-based scaffolding tools
Learners can develop drug use educational materials through a 3-stage scenario model (situation setup-investigation-decision making).
Learners can evaluate credible medical information sources and integrate them into educational scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
